subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The qualifier Pierre-Hughes Herbert reached the final of the Winston-Salem Open in North Carolina with a 3-6, 7-6 (5), 6-2 win over 13th-seeded Steve Johnson.
snippet: The qualifier Pierre-Hughes Herbert reached the final of the Winston-Salem Open in North Carolina with a 3-6, 7-6 (5), 6-2 win over 13th-seeded Steve Johnson.
